[++FPS Codes (By Gage)++]

[FPS BOOST]
D3000000 0F000000
00FFF104 00000000

[40 FPS]
003E31F4 00000002

[--]

[++Screen Codes++]

[++Broken++]

[Broken Screen]
D3000000 00000000
0034C7A4 1F400000
D2000000 00000000

[Broken Screen 2]
D3000000 00000000
0034C7A4 1F480000
D2000000 00000000

[Broken Screen 3]
D3000000 00000000
0034C7A4 1F490000
D2000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000
